data.title: AOL Acquires Quigo Technologies
data.meta_description: On December 20, 2007, AOL acquired internet software and services company Quigo Technologies for 363M USD
data.text: AOL is a media technology company that produces, distributes, and monetizes by connecting publishers with advertisers on its global, programmatic content and advertising platforms. The Company was formed in 1985 and is based in New York City.
